titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the chief clerks of the Committee on Foreign Relations and the Select Committee on Intelligence in the case of United States v. Morales, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/22/1987--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Barbara F. Allem and Kathleen P. McGhee and any committees, Members, officers, or other employees of the Senate, in the case of United States v. George Morales, et al.
